skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: p. r. t. v.
des: Pyramid Radio TV is a leading multimedia platform that offers diverse and entertaining content through radio and television broadcasting. With a mission to inform and educate, we strive to deliver quality programming that appeals to a broad audience. Tune in to experience the power of multimedia storytelling. The skill content is in English, French and Haitian creole language.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
